title: Season Preview sample + editorial plan (Founder gate)
description: Create a sample team preview (1 team) in Lindy's/Phil Steele format plus a detailed editorial plan for all 10 teams. Sample should be 2-3 pages of narrative prose covering: team outlook, key storylines, strength/weakness breakdown, players to watch with statistical context, bold take. Plan should cover: format template, tone guide, section structure, production timeline, Andy Flower collaboration model. Founder approval required before proceeding to full 10-team production.
